title: Diff. eq. slope field tang line part - b

content.description: Consider the differential equation dy/dx=−xy2/2 . Let  y = f(x) be the particular solution to this differential equation with the initial condition f(-1)=2.
content.question: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at x=-1.

frqParts.text: Write an equation for the line tangent to the graph of f at x=-1.

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
